definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲
scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The relation between the electronic counting scale repetitiveness and sample discreteness.
sentences.chinese: 電子計數秤的重複性及樣品離散性之間的關係。

sentences.english: Multiple small discrete lung nodules are visible.
sentences.chinese: 多發的離散性小結節，呈隨機型分佈。

sentences.english: The discreteness of Zi or the Chinese character is shown in its distinct identity and unboundedness.
sentences.chinese: “字”的離散性體現爲極高的獨立性和自由度。“

sentences.english: Tectonic analysis makes discrete seismic precursor be restored in time and space.
sentences.chinese: 構造解析是要對離散性的地震前兆進行構造時空復位。
